data.message:
I may be one of the 70% who has a friend who is openly gay, but, I do not approve of the gay lifestyle! Therefore, I'm not one who has gay pride. 
I love my friends, I hate their lifestyle! It doesn't stop me from being their friend, however!!! 
Homosexuality is a sin. BUT, let he who has no sin cast the first stone. Sin is sin! There isn't a giant scale that weighs 1 sin differently than another. Abortion is a sin! Cursing is a sin! Lying, stealing, cheating, murder, need I go on? It's all sin, but Jesus still loves EVERYONE! He hates the sin but loves the sinner!!!

replies.message: He hates the sin but loves the sinner? Yeah that makes perfect sense LOL SMH
It should sure stop your "riends" from being friends with you. Who wants to be friends with a bigot?
Our Lord will judge people for unrepented sin.
Amen. how many remained standing before Jesus after he made that comment. NONE! So why are we still standing before God and judging people. Only God can judge.
